This is a collection of notes that relate to the lecture series on causal inference by Brady Neal.
The lectures can be found on YouTube -- a playlist can be found [here](https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLoazKTcS0Rzb6bb9L508cyJ1z-U9iWkA0){target="_blank"}.
Brady also has a [website](https://www.bradyneal.com/causal-inference-course){target="_blank"} to accompany the video material, which includes a free text book along with a recommended book-club-style reading list.
